title: Fragment, 1921-22-9, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Narrow fragment of red cut and uncut velvet on white ground with extra weft of metallic thread. Fragment shows part of a large-scale floral motif.
